ygData.subject: RE: but can they be looted????
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for that, but now I m really confused. I must of misunderstood LORE items. I know you can have only one but I thought that made them no drop no trade.
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for that, but now I'm really confused. I must of misunderstood LORE
items. I know you can have only one but I thought that made them no drop no
trade. Can anyone please explain why an item, other than the newbie stuff
and our summoned hammers might be No Drop. Or if they know of one.

Thanks

Chas

> With the introduction of LORE items. That is the No drop/No trade items.

Lore items aren't necessarily no drop/no trade. My Mistmoore shield is
a Lore item that I routinely bank, loan to my bard friend, etc.

As for when loot can be taken. Yes, lore items can be taken; no, nodrop
items cannot be taken. And items can only be taken in a PvP venue; in a
duel, there's no looting.
